headline: Assessing Caterpillar (CAT) Valuation After Strong Share Price Momentum
summary: Caterpillar (CAT) shares have traded steadily over the past week, showing a 4% rise in the past month. Investors seem interested in how these gains compare to the company’s annual revenue and net income growth. See our latest analysis for Caterpillar. Caterpillar’s share price has picked up serious steam over the past few months, jumping nearly 15% in the last 30 days and now sitting at $569.15. Its total shareholder return stands at a remarkable 38.6% over the past year and more than 165%...
